title: Athentech Imaging Perfectly Clear 2.0.1.10 Plugin for Photoshop
description:
Perfectly Clear - a powerful plug-in for Adobe Lightroom and Adobe Photosop from Athentech Imaging of a series of "do I quickly and beautifully," allowing only a couple of mouse clicks to adjust the photos of perfect type of automatic, and correct them manually.

Digital cameras have limitations, which lead to such distortions photos: illumination, the lack of richness and depth, underexposure, opacity, blur, poor skin tone, "red eye", noise, etc. Perfectly Clear plug will fix these flaws automatically or manually, using its own proprietary technology, which embodied 10 years of research and more than 10 patented adjustments.

New Features in Athentech Perfectly Clear 2

Perfectly Clear plug allows you to automatically adjust the following settings:
- White Balance
- Color Tone
- The depth and intensity of color
- Clean the photograph (Noise Reduction)
- Portrait photograph
- Skin Tone
- Exposure
- Sharpness

Traditional methods of auto correcting images do not always lead to the desired result. Perfectly Clear deserves your attention that would trust him with auto-correct your photos with priceless memories. Do not always have the time to manually correct each photo.
Perfectly Clear enables you to instantly with one click photo to bring to perfection. Just run the plugin and selected photos will be automatically corrected.

Features :

- Support for layers
- Edit only the selected area on the image
- Smart sharpness (New range: 0-200 instead of 0-100)
- Efficient use of memory.
- Changes the size of the plug
- Effective labels save even more time
- Advanced Interface
